explains: adj. 思乡的；引人怀旧的

sentences.en: He made a nostalgic return visit to Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 他满怀怀旧之情重游夏威夷。

sentences.en: Although we still depict nostalgic snow scenes on Christmas cards, winters are now very much warmer.
sentences.cn: 虽然我们还在圣诞卡上描绘引人怀旧的雪景，但现在冬天温暖多了。

sentences.en: The overall tone of the book is gently nostalgic.
sentences.cn: 这本书整体格调是温情的怀旧。
